scripts.all:install: pnpm --dir back install && pnpm --dir front install
scripts.build: pnpm --filter back build && pnpm --filter front build
scripts.codegen:graphql: pnpm --filter back codegen:graphql && pnpm --filter front codegen:graphql
scripts.all:eslint:check: pnpm --filter back eslint:check && pnpm --filter front eslint:check
